QuestData.Title: Condition Critical!
QuestData.Description: We have the enemy on their heels. Victory is within sight!$b$bIt is not yet time to celebrate though, $c. There remains much to be done before the Horde can lay claim to Ashenvale.$b$bAt Raynewood Retreat to the east a battle has been joined. Reports indicate many Horde wounded.$b$bTake these medical supplies there and give them to Thagg. Tell him of our assault on Astranaar. It may help to bolster morale.
QuestData.LogDescription: Goggath wants you to bring the Battle Triage Kit to Thagg at Raynewood Retreat.
QuestData.RewardText: <Thagg listens intently as you recount your assault on Astranaar.>$b$bThis is good news indeed, $r. But right now, we need more than just good news here.$b$bThese triage kits will be put to good use!
